name: Blynd
description:
Blynd

Experience what it is like to get through game using just sounds. In Demo version there are five levels available, all of different gamemodes.  

For now, only Demo version is available, but Full Release will be on Steam in few weeks. I will keep you posted through website where also screenshots from game are available.

If you have any suggestions or complaints, you can contact me through Email or Website.
